attributes.action: To insure that parcells posted to our loved ones in the British Armed Forces in Afganistan are received in a timely fashion and not to be delayed as is the case at the moment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our family has been sending parcels. since the 20 th of july 09. my nephew who is a fusilier serving in Afganistan has not received any of them  to date 11/9/09. these parcels are vital for the moral of the soilders.
